languages.text: "На планете еще остались люди, не павшие в объятия ереси и достойные спасения. Однако у нас, к сожалению, недостаточно челноков для масштабной эвакуации, а из звездной гавани вырвалось слишком мало шаттлов, чтобы изменить ситуацию".

"There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."
languages.original_text: "На планете еще остались люди, не павшие в объятия ереси и достойные спасения. Однако у нас, к сожалению, недостаточно челноков для масштабной эвакуации, а из звездной гавани вырвалось слишком мало шаттлов, чтобы изменить ситуацию".

traits.locale_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

"There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

"There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

"There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

languages.text: “不过，这颗行星上依然有部分尚未皈依异端的人，这些人值得救援。我们没有足够的穿梭机进行大规模疏散，而且我们从星港回收来的穿梭机数量太少，不足以改变疏散能力不足的现状。”
languages.original_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

traits.locale_text: “不过，这颗行星上依然有部分尚未皈依异端的人，这些人值得救援。我们没有足够的穿梭机进行大规模疏散，而且我们从星港回收来的穿梭机数量太少，不足以改变疏散能力不足的现状。”

languages.text: 「確かに、異端に屈していない、救助に値する人々がまだこの星にいます。ですが、大規模な避難を行うにはシャトルが足りていません。そして状況を変えるにはスターポートを脱したシャトルが少なすぎます」
languages.original_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、異端に屈していない、救助に値する人々がまだこの星にいます。ですが、大規模な避難を行うにはシャトルが足りていません。そして状況を変えるにはスターポートを脱したシャトルが少なすぎます」
「確かに、異端に屈していない、救助に値する人々がまだこの星にいます。ですが、大規模な避難を行うにはシャトルが足りていません。そして状況を変えるにはスターポートを脱したシャトルが少なすぎます」

languages.text: "Es gibt immer noch Menschen auf dem Planeten, die der Ketzerei nicht erlegen sind und Rettung verdienen. Allerdings haben wir nicht genügend Shuttles für eine groß angelegte Evakuierung, und zu wenige Shuttles sind dem Raumhafen entkommen, um das zu ändern."
languages.original_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt immer noch Menschen auf dem Planeten, die der Ketzerei nicht erlegen sind und Rettung verdienen. Allerdings haben wir nicht genügend Shuttles für eine groß angelegte Evakuierung, und zu wenige Shuttles sind dem Raumhafen entkommen, um das zu ändern."

languages.text: « Il reste encore des gens sur la planète qui n'ont pas succombé à l'hérésie et qui méritent d'être secourus. Cela étant dit, nous ne disposons pas d'un nombre suffisant de navettes pour procéder à une évacuation de grande ampleur, et ce ne sont pas celles qui sont parvenues à s'échapper de l'astroport qui pourront changer la donne. »
languages.original_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

traits.locale_text: « Il reste encore des gens sur la planète qui n'ont pas succombé à l'hérésie et qui méritent d'être secourus. Cela étant dit, nous ne disposons pas d'un nombre suffisant de navettes pour procéder à une évacuation de grande ampleur, et ce ne sont pas celles qui sont parvenues à s'échapper de l'astroport qui pourront changer la donne. »

languages.text: «Aún queda gente en el planeta que no ha sucumbido a la herejía y que merece el rescate. Sin embargo, no tenemos suficientes lanzaderas para realizar una evacuación a gran escala, y no conseguimos recuperar suficientes del puerto estelar como para que supongan una diferencia».
languages.original_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

traits.locale_text: «Aún queda gente en el planeta que no ha sucumbido a la herejía y que merece el rescate. Sin embargo, no tenemos suficientes lanzaderas para realizar una evacuación a gran escala, y no conseguimos recuperar suficientes del puerto estelar como para que supongan una diferencia».

languages.text: "Gezegende hâlâ sapkınlığa boyun eğmemiş ve kurtarılmaya değer insanlar var. Ne var ki büyük çaplı bir tahliye için yeterli mekiğimiz yok. Yıldız limanından kaçan pek az sayıdaki mekik de durumu değiştirmiyor."
languages.original_text: "There are still people on the planet who have not succumbed to heresy and who are worthy of rescue. However, we do not have enough shuttles for a large-scale evacuation, and too few shuttles escaped the starport to change the situation."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegende hâlâ sapkınlığa boyun eğmemiş ve kurtarılmaya değer insanlar var. Ne var ki büyük çaplı bir tahliye için yeterli mekiğimiz yok, yıldız limanından kaçan mekikler de durumu değiştirmiyor."
